name: convergence
description:
It is the present.  World War III has been averted. 

Claire, a time traveler, only has to live out the rest of her days as an ordinary citizen.

This is my entry for the yuri game jam 2017.  It's not a romance story, but it is a story very much relating to my anxiety as a woman and a queer person -- although told through the lens of sci-fi time travel.

Features:
+ 6.6k words for a playtime of roughly an hour
+ 4 endings

Staff:
+  Story and Character Art cloverfirefly (tumblr | homepage)

Note:
Unlike my other games, it is possible to get to a bad ending.
